name: Just Race
description:
Note : Sorry, i dont create Loading Screen,, so if you encounter black screen that's my loading screen

Remember! Avoid obstacles or game over.

Control:

Esc -> Pause

Space -> Jump

Up Arrow -> Move up

Right Arrow -> Move right

Down Arrow -> Move down

Credit:

Game Design, Art, and Programming by Faisal Rahman

BGM by ericskiff.com
SFX by bfxr.net

Thanks for playing!!
